meanings.definition: The quality or state of being supernatural.
meanings.sent1: The supernaturalnesses of the ghost stories captivated the children.
meanings.sent2: Belief in supernaturalnesses can vary greatly among different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The movie exaggerated the supernaturalnesses of the haunted house for comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: Her aura had a mysterious supernaturalnesses that drew people to her.
meanings.sent5: The forest was shrouded in an eerie supernaturalnesses as the sun set.

meanings.definition: The supernatural or paranormal aspects of something.
meanings.sent1: The supernaturalnesses of the old mansion gave it a spooky vibe.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the supernaturalnesses of the Bermuda Triangle has always intrigued scientists.
meanings.sent3: The show delved into the supernaturalnesses of alien abductions with a humorous twist.
meanings.sent4: The painting seemed to possess a strange supernaturalnesses that left viewers in awe.
meanings.sent5: The book described the supernaturalnesses of the wizarding world in vivid detail.
